price: It is they who are upon guidance from their Lord, and it is they who are successful.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَلَىٰ هُدٗى مِّن رَّبِّهِمۡۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
